name: keycloak_user
description: The digital identity representing a physical person

attributes.name: keycloak_user_id
attributes.description: The unique identifier from the keycloak system

attributes.name: email_verified
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user email has been verified

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the user account is active and can be used

attributes.name: realm_id
attributes.description: The keycloak namespace to which the user belongs

attributes.name: created_at
attributes.description: The timestamp when the user was created

attributes.name: identity_providers
attributes.description: The external identity providers associated with the user

identity_provider.name: identity_provider
identity_provider.description: The external identity provider that the user used to authenticate

federated_user_id.name: federated_user_id
federated_user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user in the external identity provider system

federated_username.name: federated_username
federated_username.description: The username of the user in the external identity provider system
